item.title: Summary of Teaching Roles and Responsibilities
item.description: Instructor of record Research Methods: Data Science, Justice, and Social Change Term: Fall 2025 Lead Instructor: Me! Course Details: This course provides the rigorous data science training and core content knowledge students need to use data science to effect policy changes that promote a more just society. To explore these topics, students engage in in-class discussions on the intersections between psychology and justice. Students also conduct their own research project by analyzing a found dataset, with a focus on justice-oriented outcomes.
